alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 19 at 10:54AM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches...mainly from Munising east into the northern portions of Luce County. Lesser amounts are anticipated elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Alger and Luce counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow band currently approaching the Alger and Luce shorelines will cause rapid accumulations within a time frame of only about a couple of hours. Additional moderate to heavy lake-effect snow is expected later today behind this initial band through tonight and into early Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
